content:
Q: Annual Trip Insurance vs Single Trip Insurance - Which is better?
A: Single Trip Travel Insurance provides coverage for the destination youâ€™ve indicated. Meanwhile, an Annual Trip Travel Insurance gives better value should you have already planned to go on more than two trips in the year.
